creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
inscription:
Title and Inscription

Bottom margin, printed in black: (map key)
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, MN
signed: Bottom center, printed in black: Venduta dell'insigne Basilica Vaticana coll'ampio Portico, e Piazza adjacente
text: Though trained as an architect Giovanni Battista Piranesi's greatest monuments appeared on paper. With exceptional theatrical flair, he glorified Rome's accomplishments, both ancient and modern. Here he employs a bird's-eye view to convey the grandeur and splendor of Saint Peter's Basilica and Bernini's colonnade.
title: Venduta dell'insigne Basilica Vaticana coll'ampio Portico, e Piazza adjacente, Plate 120 from Vendute di Roma
